'{{Audio|Nl-Socialistische Partij Anders.ogg|Socialistische Partij
Anders|help=no}}' (Socialist Party â Differently) ('sp.a') is a Flemish social-
democratic political party in
Belgium. It was formerly known as the 'Socialistische Partij (SP)', which in
turn had branched off from the Belgian Socialist Party, itself formed by former
members of the Belgian Labour Party. As of 6 December 2011, sp.a is currently
part of the Di Rupo Government, along with its Francophone counterpart the
Socialist Party (PS). It is also part of the Flemish Government.
categories: Party of European Socialists member parties
